TopicTitle: Survey on Reusable vs Expendable Launch Vehicles

Articles.Content:
I would appreciate your help in completing a survey for a class. I am conducting a Survey on Reusable vs Expendable Launch vehicles for my Technical Communications class. The Survey is not long.

http://goo.gl/forms/xN6ujp8pvm

Thank you very much. and i would appreciate you not discussing the survey in the comments.

Edited October 31, 2014 by B787_300
Its hard to think of an ontopic response without discussing the topic
Is this a test on how much people guestimate things or is it trying to pry some real information loose?
Lots of guesstimation on that survey. Guessing makes me uncomfortable.

Some of both... i can match the answers up and see how close you are to the Real Values over the entire survey and if you are with in +-1sigma then you fall into the know a good bit about space, and outside of that i can write about the general publics ignorance

The probability of people frequenting this forum know quite a bit about the topic already and your survey will be quite a bit biased towards knowing more than the average person.. Have you also posted it in other areas as well? Enough to offset the knowledge here?
nope... anyways THOR went on to become Delta... Not Titan
